author: chris-dollin
msg: ensured that successful test runs don't leave FileGraph debris in temp directory

author: chris-dollin
msg: Added transactions to FileGraps and InfGraphBase descendants. Added
jms:modelName to JMS family. Fixed problem in ModelMakerImpl.

author: chris-dollin
msg: Updated JMS so that we have FileModelSpecs, the new jms:modelName property
(with domain ModelSpec) and added domain FileModelMaker to jms:fileBase.

author: chris-dollin
msg: The JMS vocabulary now defers loading its schema until first use.

author: andy_seaborne
msg: Changed the classaloader used by the glbal filemanager.
Removed convenience method to add the system class loader.  That's a bad choice under, say, Tomcat.
